titles.title: PFAS Registry Act of 2019
PFAS Registry Act of 2019

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish and maintain a registry for certain individuals who may have been exposed to per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances due to the environmental release of aqueous film-forming foam on military installations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
PFAS Registry Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs to establish a registry for current or past members of the Armed Forces who may have been exposed to per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances due to the environmental release of aqueous film-forming foam at a military installation or other Department of Defense location.
